metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20251 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in samba. A race condition in the password lockout code may lead to the risk of brute force attacks being successful if special conditions are met.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> Samba team considers this issue not serious enough for an advisory, and did not publish updates for releases earlier than 4.16

criterions.comment: samba package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
